ModMetaData.name: Pawn Badge - Halo MCC Rank Badges
ModMetaData.author: Snare
ModMetaData.description:
Season rank icons from Halo - The Master Chief Collection, for PawnBadge-FanFork by Ogliss
If you have a badge request hit me up.
Requires PawnBadge-FanFork by Ogliss. Rangel Reale (original author) Saucy_Pigeon (updated code) LeninsCat (fixed manifest error)
